text: I gave them my insurance info and they didn’t use it, and told me I had to go to the drop off counter for them to correct their mistakes. I chose to pay rather than wait any longer than I already had. I understand it was busy, but I’ve worked in customer service, and the medical field, and you always work with the patient and customers to fix YOUR mistake especially when they have been sitting in front of you for 30 minutes waiting on their medications for a tooth extraction. I chose to just pay rather than continue to argue with the cashier, whose fault it wasn’t. If you are at the drop off counter and someone gives you their insurance information you should probably be competent enough to enter it in. Unfortunately, this has happened before at other Walmart’s as well. I would recommend going anywhere else, because I’ve never had that happen at Publix, CVS, or Walgreens.

text: I started with Vital Force in January 2021.  As a Registered Nurse, you better believe I did some research and asked questions prior to starting. I also knew something was more wrong than being a 50yr old menopausal woman who had to live with it.  The program was explained in detail.  Once my lab work came back.  I mean an extensive panel of labs!  The proof was right there in front of me.  The Team at Vital Force tailored a program to fit my needs.  It took about 3 weeks of taking supplements and IV infusion therapy then I noticed a huge change in my self. Each week, I was better than the last.  I HAVE MY LIFE BACK !!  I feel better than I have in years.  If you don't take time to take care of yourself, you body will make you do it !  If you are in doubt about whether Vital Force is right for you , GO, meet with the team and let them help you be the best version of yourself.

I said what i had to say and hung up. Walmart customer service is terrible. They exhibit a unconcerned and unprofessional attitude. Thank goodness i dont get my medications from them. name: Ronald Bryant
text:
Very poor selection for the location. Frequently out of an amazing range of products. Usually after 7pm they are stocking products. Shouldn't that be done overnight. The cashier's for the most part are lazy and unknowlegable about placing products in the bags. For example: eggs and heavy can food in the same bags. Bread and heavy products in the same bag. Cookies in the bag with heavy products. Two two liter drinks in the same single bag.
Bags are very poor quality to start with. Will not even willing to place the bags in the cart. Least they could do for 50, 100, 150, is to make the effort to place the products in the basket. The checkout is made to make the customer do all the work. Again a lot of people are spending thousands of dollars a year and getting very poor treatment. The area where where the carts are placed are often empty. Carts are all over the parking lot. And not gathered up by employees on a frequent basis. There are some very good employees, but they frequently on the cell phones. Isn't that something people in general are fired for? The carts are frequently loaded with the trash from the previous customer.
Come on Wal-Mart, you make billions a year, you can do a much better job. And it would be nice to show your appreciation to your Customers. We are important, show it.

text: I have arthritis in my knees.  Do not like taking meds as most make me feel nauseous.  Had heard about CBD oil from others who used it, and decided to try it. name: Jeannabeanna Stephens
text: Don't know where to start. Most people like this place, but don't go if you don't know what you want. I told them my symptoms (and meds) and was pushed to buy 2 products. Got home to research and both items interfered with my medications. Taking items back is like you broke some major rule. It is frowned upon. Not that they care, but I won't be back.

resp.text:
Jeanna, I am so sorry about your experience, and I hope that you will change your mind and give us another chance. Our employees are not allowed to give medical advice. Our policy is to tell you to talk to your pharmacist about possible interactions. That being said, the internet is NOT a good place to research that information. I implore you to ask your pharmacist.

As for feeling frowned upon for a return, please understand that we are human and are capable of allowing our emotions to show on our sleeve as much as anyone, but I will talk to the employee that assisted you and let her know that she made you feel badly.

Again, I apologize for your experience and hope that you will give us a chance to make it right.

name: Aquarius X2
text: I was with Tyner's for many years. They have one very rude pharmacist, but everyone else was nice. I have a particular medicine and my body can only handle a particular brand. Otherwise I get sick. Tyner's use to keep them in stock for me. One day I was basically told to go elsewhere. In a bind, I went to Carroll's. I was so amazed at the customer service. They only had 25 of what I needed. They gave me those and wrote out a red card for me to come back the next morning for the rest! They ordered what I needed right then and was able to have the rest the next day! I've never been able to do that anywhere!! I will never go back. Tyner's said they didn't have them and didn't know when they would have them again!

name: Natalie Sanders
text: Filled my prescriptions quick and everyone was very nice I will continue to use this pharmacy

name: Karen Tisdale
text: Super quick filling prescriptions  and very friendly staff. Location also is extremely convenient in Trussville and I love that they have a drive thru.

name: Melissa Kirkpatrick
text: I love Carroll Pharmacy! After using big chain stores, I will never go anywhere but Carroll's. The staff is super attentive, quick, and they care about you. They have a drive thru you can use for prescription pick up. It is definitely worth going in the store though. They have an amazing selection of jewelry, boutique clothing, gifts, candles, and much more. They also have a whole football section with local school merchandise. Just a great place!

name: Lynda
text: They are very nice and friendly. I moved my prescriptions from another pharmacy, because they attempted to over charge me on several things, not so with Carroll's

name: Terry Willcutt
text: Great Place

name: Mindy Hulsey
text:
They're great 😊 they've always been very kind and helpful! They always help even if I've got my hands full or they're busy. They've even called me to check if a medicine was OK with me when the doctor called it in. ❤
I even bumped into the pharmacist at the vet and he talked me through some questions I had about my son with asthma and meds and inhalers. He didn't mind at all! He loved to help and he and all the others there are always like that! Thank you all for always being so kind

name: James Jones
text: Typical Wal-Mart pharmacy. Have what you need at a good price and the service is good. Always better to call ahead of course so you don't have to wait.

name: Jerry “BadMuthaFuka22” Gibson
text: Worst people ever to work at a pharmacy. Very rude. But prices are not bad.

name: Natalie Newsom
text: Horrible customer service! We’ve been using this pharmacy for the past few years and lately they have become SO rude and disrespectful! Needless to say we will be taking our business elsewhere. There’s just no need to be rude!

name: Baby Yoda
text: Store greatest are old and feeble. Very mean to shoppers. Bad experience for me.

name: Barbara Hann
text: The attendees are very nice

name: stacy brannon
text: Quick easy and cheap

name: Amanda McClendon
text:
Had my child’s prescription called in after his Dr visit. Took my sick child home and waited over an hour before stopping by for his prescription just to give them time to fill it so I wouldn’t have to make him wait there while feeling so bad. Was told it still wasn’t ready that it would be another half hour...
I’m in desperate need of changing pharmacies. This one is terrible

name: Emily Tinsley
text: Very unwillingness to help and acted like I was an inconvenience to them trying to get an antibiotic filled. Told me I would have to wait at least one hour if not longer. It was like she hoped I would go somewhere else.

name: Melissa Rice
text: Not helpful, horrible attitude, could not care less about patients.

name: Angel (Angel)
text:
This pharmacy has some very rude employees.  I actually moved to another one because I got tired of all the bs.

Update: My regular pharmacy was out of my insulin so I called it in here.  Was told it was in stock.  Drove there to find out that they were out of stock.  Total rubish.

name: Gerald Henson
text: I suggest you call your prescription in unless you want to wait and unreasonable amount of time to get it if you care the prescription to them. Checking out can be an experience to where there were a line of eight of us with two registers only one was open and I believe the female didn't know what she was doing.I'm also glad that I checked in the bag for I walked out of the store because they give me the wrong prescription to a totally different person whose name was nowhere close to mine.

name: Luke Sullivan
text: Super nice staff

name: Tiffany LaShea
text: Great prices true but having to wait for 24 hours after they said would be ready in 1 hour the day before  is horrible. Hopefully next month will be better.

name: rachel mims
text: Absolutely worst pharmacy. The employees here are about as good as the rest of the store if that tells you anything.

name: elizabeth pruitt
text:
waited at the “drop off” window for 10 minutes before i finally left to find another pharmacy.
the one worker i did speak to was rude and rash about the information i was requesting.
workers behind the counter kept walking past me.
honestly, this place is so swamped and disorganized i will not be back. ever.

name: Dixie Bishop
text: Always friendly!

name: cynthia blackmon/boivin
text: Love the selection but it's crazy town.

name: Carolann McFry
text: They gave me my 1st covid shot I did fine but 8 days later got a rash on my arm on the injection called said it was normal it went away a day later

name: George Gomez
text: The best place to get your shots.  Great staff.

name: David Carroll
text: The staff is very friendly and helpful with explanation of medication

name: Wyatt Cornelius
text: Best pharmacy in the area and great staff.

name: Louiese Nelms
text: Okay staff but not very helpful.

name: Justin Canada
text: This is the 3rd different occasion that I have called to either check on a prescription or price of a prescription. 2 times I was redirected 5 times with nobody answering and 1 time they didn't carry my medication, wouldn't even offer to order it, and was judgemental and rude about it. I now drive to Gadsden, an hour roundtrip out of my way, rather than here (6 minutes away) to deal with this poorly maintained attempt of a pharmacy.

name: jeff maywell
text: These ppl that work in this store are to povide service to the consumer. They do nothing but judge ppl as THEY see fit. Your not GOD..... do your job like your surpost todo. Yes... these means you ....

name: Terry May
text: Its a well trusted place. Been around a long time. So they must be doing something right

name: Layla Jones
text: Every pharmacist and associate at Store #1057 5 stars all around!

name: Pat Mason
text: Good place. I signed up for text alerts,,super simple

name: Margaret Byers
text: First! The pharmacists here stop and take time to listen to any concerns. Very knowledgeable and kind.

name: Foster White
text: Service is great .You can count on them.

name: Wendy Madison
text: Quick service. Great staff and friendly.

name: Vicki Jones
text: Very friendly and helpful. More than the ladies had to be, that 's for sure... No insurance at the time but went way above and beyond to find discounts for my RX's ...

name: Erin Allen
text: Great staff! Never a line.

name: Nu won
text: ALWAYS, ALWAYS treats me like I'm important to them and they ALWAYS do whatever they can to make sure that my prescriptions are filled on time. If there are ever any problems,  they have it worked out before I ever arrive. Most places slowed down and had issues since the covid crisis. However, walmart pharmacy, in Gadsden specifically,  somehow improved on their service and I just know that I won't have to worry about anything when it comes to my prescriptions. It is every employee ranging from the pharmacist to the tech and cashier. Thank you! God bless you and your family!

name: jack nipper
text: Walmart pharmacy are dedicated workers pay should be more

name: Melody Green
text: Very pleased with their service. Have been polite and helpful. Email us when meds are due for refill and pickup. Thank you!

name: kimberlina68
text:
There is no management or guidance of the employees.  They are out of control with rudeness and absolutely zero customer service skills.  With just a little effort, this pharmacy could be great.  Honestly, they think if they are rude, then people will stop coming to the pharmacy and then they could just stand around doing nothing.

10/30/2020
If I could lower it below 1 star, I would.  My medications were ordered and paid for, on the website. This happen 10/23/2020.  Pharmacy was supposed to Fed Ex my 5 prescriptions to my home less than 10 minutes away because I have medical problems driving.  Anyway, I called Tues and was told by Sarah, the meds should be there by Wed 28th. I then called on 29th and was told there was another problem with Fed Ex and they would be there the next day (today).  Well today it is 3 pm and there is no Fed Ex package of my medicines that I need.  I tried to explain this to the Pharmacist, Michelle.  I thought she might be educated and actually have feelings about other people that are going through problems due to their lack of CUSTOMER SERVICE. At the least, they should have called me to explain.  She got very angry and before hanging up, starting yelling “oh my God, I can’t believe...   I just hung up, but I felt like I needed to let her know know she should say stuff like that without hanging up.  I have copies of my medicines being ordered on 10/23/2020 and Fed Ex tracking number being created on 10/26th.  It is 10/30th, and I still don’t have the medicine I need.  I pray no one there ever has to go through what I go through with them.

name: Angel (Angel)
text: I call in a medication at 12:47pm told to pick it up in 1.5 hours.  Go to pick it up and they have no record of me calling to fill it.  Phones are hard to get through.  Total rubish.

name: kram c.m
text: Have had no issues, they remind me of need for refills, always ready for pick up or drive through

name: Brenda Stallo
text: multiple times didn't fill the prescription and blamed the Doctors.  Multiple times did not refill the needles with the prescription for Insulin sq. Changed to the Wal Mart Pharmacy in Attalla. Its a 32 miles around trip from my home but I feel safer using them, they are friendly and not rude.  If I questioned a prescription at the East Gadsden Wal Mart Pharmacy I was treated as if I was bothering them even if they filled the prescription wrong.  I need to add that most of the prescriptions were for other family members and now I've been on hold at the East Gadsden WalMart for 16 minutes waiting to verify a prescription for a terminally ill relative.

name: Evelise Martinez-Elrod
text: Was supposed to have my prescription filled before July 1st. They just filled it on July 3rd....

name: Sharon Francis
text: This place is on unbelievable you order you medicine they don't fill it, Then you come pick it up and I tell you you didn't order it you come-back to pick it up couple days later,  Then I tell you they're out and I have to order it I came back 2 days later and say I need a  authorization then I come to pick it up after talking to my doctor to get the authorization, But guess what thats not what they needed! They needed  a new perscription because we were out of refills ? And each person wants to blame it on another person and I ask why don't you just call us and tell us that you didn't have it s or you need an authorization ?

name: Wendy Uhlman
text: It's okay.... Sometimes you get friendly service....

name: Chara Kelley (Sweet-Tea)
text: They are The Worst Pharmacy ! They play with people's prescriptions & they think everything is so funny ! People are sick and need their medicine, they should be ashamed of themselves & treat people with respect & dignity. All they care about is their self and collecting a paycheck!

name: Diane Sexton
text: Rude customer service

name: marcus johnson
text: Worst service ever.

name: Kiley Perethian
text: Close early. Open late. Very unprofessional and rude.

name: Sherry Howell
text: On multiple times they said my script had not been called in .I work for the doctor and was right there when it was called in .They are also very rude .Not to mention excessively long wait times

name: Carol Dillard
text: Never had my prescriptions correct.

name: virginia miller
text: It's. Alright

name: Lance Whestine
text: Rude and laugh and carry on 24/7

name: Laron Hardy
text: Great people!  Great products! Best smoothies in the world!  I'm addicted to them.

name: ashtonbsmith1
text: Open at 9am my ass. not even open at 10.

name: Jill Carter
text:
They are always very gracious and quite quick when you want to wait for your meds.
There are a lot of new faces now, but they are still kind people. I really do miss some of the older employees that really took the time to get to know you personally. But I would recommend this place to EVERYONE!
I just wish it was a 24 hour since there is not any other close

name: Rocky Redding
text: Always good.

name: Michael B
text: Fast and friendly service. I always look forward to passing by the Pharmacy area to wave and say hi to the staff. Dr. Tony, Dr. Autumn, Shannon, and Rachel are some of the best employees I have seen at a Walmart Pharmacy.

name: Diane Nelson
text: Everything you need in one place 😊go get your healthy on😄

name: Karen Langston
text: Great products that really work

name: Chris Butler
text: By far the best gym I've ever joined and had the pleasure of being a member of. They've done an excellent job of navigating the whole covid-19 situation. They were extremely professional and understandable in all aspects of the pandemic. The staff and members do a great job of keeping the place clean and organized. It is never over-crowded and the atmosphere is one of community. There's no room for intimation or competitiveness. Everyone there is there for one common goal so if you're looking for a gym where you can go and get a great workout in without being pressured or harassed, you'd be hard pressed to find one as good as Jason's.

resp.text: Thank You Chris!

name: Lydia Sullivan
text: Clean and not crowded, with an atmosphere of dedication and grit. Friendly patrons and staff, who while nice also respect your need to work and not socialize.

resp.text: Thank You Lydia. Members like you make the past 40-years worth it!

name: Jason Stewart
text:
I swipe my card and open the door.  The lights come on.  The hair bands begin to play.  I step through the entrance, and into another dimension.  Time and space are left behind, as I ascend into a higher domain of reps and kilograms.

Quality equipment surrounds me.  Though I am spoiled for choice, I choose a station.  As I adjust my weights, I feel a gaze upon me.  I turn to meet it.  A wall of champions stare back, with determination and approval.  I add more weight... to remain worthy.

As you hoist here, hoist proudly.  As you exhale, exhale with reverence!  This is no mere 1-on-1 personal training, supplement and exercise equipment selling, 24-hour access fitness center with smoothie cafe.  No.  This is a shrine of greatness!

resp.text: Wow! I just saw this post. I cannot thank you enough. I love it when people actually get it. Welcome home Jason, welcome home!

name: Jerry Weaver
text: I've been training at Jason's for 39 years.  I've visited other clubs to see what they have to offer and none of them have the atmosphere and staff like Jason's.  Jason's also has the best mix of equipment and free weights of any club I have seen. I addition to the staff, the members are great, which adds to the overall atmosphere at Jason's.

resp.text: Thank you. That's high praise coming from you!

name: Jess
text: Best gym in Mobile! Love the atmosphere here. The equipment is clean, it's never crowded, and the staff really goes above and beyond. An added perk - some days you might even be greeted by the gym pups!

resp.text: On behalf of the family, staff and especially the pups Thank You Jessica!

name: Keela Puckett
text:
Jason's Fitness has been great!  Equipment, it's there.....
The staff is excellent - good people, very knowledgeable and helpful!
Jason designed exercise sessions that are specific to my needs.        Along with trainer Daniel Gardner, they continue to adjust and modify my program as needed.                                                                                             These exercise adjustments have been a key element for me.
Also, pleased to say that I'm making new friends at the gym!
Tim Puckett
____________________________________________________________________
At age 65 (and retired) with professions in the freight business and 36 years in the oil field, trauma from accidents outside of work (that included broken legs), along with surgeries on both shoulders, I thought "this is it, live with it". I was wrong.
Needed all the help that I could get, and got it!
Noticing couples of my age group working together, and have hopes that my wife will join in the near future.
Tim Puckett

resp.text: Thank you so much Tim.  People like you are why it has been a joy to come to work every day for the past 38-Years!

name: Lori
text: My job brought me to Foley for a couple of weeks and I was so thankful to find Jason's Fitness so I could continue my training.  Jason took the time to ask about my current training regime and was able to develop a routine specific to my needs and capability.   My trainer Josh, was keen on spotting my areas of weakness and strength and worked with Jason in customizing my workouts further to target the areas needed most.   Thank you Jason and Josh!

resp.text: Lori it was a pleasure having you. Hope to see you again soon!

name: gnimelfemsti
text: This gym is amazing. I spent seven months training here and I wish I could go back. The staff are both knowledge and courteous.  I've been to many gyms in my travels,  Jason's is by far my favorite.  It was never crowded,  the  other members were always friendly and willing to spot.  If I could give more stars I would.

resp.text: Thank you so, so much.  Words like this make coming to work a blast!

name: Shelby Weaver
text: Working out at Jason's is the best part of my week! I love the atmosphere there, everyone feels like family.

resp.text: We are family!

name: Alexandra Butts
text: Hands down the best gym in town! The managment is always available and willing to help. Cleanest gym I’ve ever been in. This place changed my life!

resp.text: It has been our pleasure.  You are a great addition to the family!

name: Alexx Collier
text: Best gym in the area- by far. Love the family oriented atmosphere and the gym itself is superb! 🖤🖤 Jason, Kelly, Daniel and Andrea are all incredible.

resp.text: Thank you Alexx!  It's because of people like you we are still here 39-years later!

name: Kendal Hood
text: Jason's Fitness is awesome! I travel a lot between mobile and Baldwin county, so I workout at both clubs often. Both facility's are great, but they just dumped some serious money into the Foley location. Brand new Indoor basketball court (2015), New equipment, Constantly getting new supplements in the shop. No Doubt, Best gym I've ever been a member off! The staff is always friendly, equipment is always clean, and doors are open rain or shine 365. What more could you ask for?!

name: Alison Bolton
text:
I switched to this gym from another local gym and Jason’s Fitness is 1000000% better than the other gym ever THOUGHT of being. I used to work at my university’s gym, so I have an idea of what I liked in a gym.

The staff is so nice and helpful. They answer any and all questions that I have and make the environment very positive.

The equipment is kept up very well. I never had any trouble using the equipment I wanted. It is not overcrowded with super noisy patrons. There are no ripped pads or broken cords.

It is also CLEAN. This was a huge issue at my last gym. I swear the staff at my old gym never clean; they just sat around on their phones and laptops with their back’s turned to everyone. The locker rooms and bathrooms always look clean and the equipment is clean at Jason’s. There are no  dumbells and plates strewn across the floor. The staff does a wonderful job at making this place neat and clean.

I’m so glad to finally be at a gym that makes me feel comfortable and excited to workout again.

resp.text: Alison, Thank you for the Love and welcome to the club.  We've been getting it done since 1981 and people like you make it all worth while!

name: Jesse Heydorn
text: I travel quite bit for work and it’s hard to find decent gyms to train at. I saw that Jason’s had some of the best reviews in mobile so I decided to check it out yesterday.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and they showed me around the gym and made me feel right at home. The gym itself isn’t huge but they’ve got everything you need and then some.  It has this golden era body building feel to it with all kinds of awesome pics on the walls of competitors that have trained there.  They actually had a few machines that I’ve never even seen before as well. Definitely give this place a try if you live here or just need to get a good workout in!!

resp.text: Thanks Jesse.  Hope you had a blast!

name: Tabitha Knotts
text: I have been going to Jason's for 4 years now & am 100% certain I will never go to any other gym in my life. Everyone there is like family & the atmosphere is very motivating. There's also nothing better than knowing you are breathing clean air while training!

name: Blake Lee
text: Absolutely love this gym!!  It feels like a second home.  The staff and members are highly friendly and feel like a family.  Very nice equipment and a good variety that most gyms don't have (chains, battle ropes, etc).  They have a smoothie bar and small store as well, so you get all your before and after gym needs.  24/7 access so it fits any schedule.  Jason's is by far the best gym I have ever stepped in, with the nicest "gym clique" I could image.  10/10!!

name: Mandie Day
text: I Love this Gym!! I've been here for about a year and a half now and couldn't be happier with it. It is hardly every busy, and it is really  convenient having the 24 hour access. The Boot Camps here are pretty cool too, a cheaper alternative to personal trainers, but all the hard work and accountability of one. The tanning beds here are good too, they just got a 10 minute stand up bed that I'm pretty impressed with. Overall great place to work out.

name: Darrell Taylor
text:
Lets see...24/7 Access, Boot Camps, Basketball Court, Tanning Beds (both lying and standing by the way), Sauna, Team (Group) Training, and One-on-One Personal Training. If that was all it would be enough, but that's not all. A Great Smoothie awaits you for after your workout...my favorite the Chunky Monkey!

This place is great. Its not a large box chain gym with no personality. This is a place to come train and get fit with all the tools to do so. But also a place to come and have a good time while you work out. Tell Kelly at the front desk that Darrell sent you! And I'll see you at Jason's Fitness!

resp.text: Thank you D!

name: Jordan Barbarin
text: I have been a member at Jason's in mobile for almost 2 years. and I absolutely  love it here! The atmosphere here amazing. It isn't intimidating at all like I falsely assumed it would be. It is a pick up weights, not dates sort of place. Its always clean, and has excellent customer service. The boot camp classes make weight loss fun! I would defiantly recommend it to every one.

name: ashley barrameda
text: I absolutely enjoyed my gym experience. The front counter lady Kelly was extremely pleasant and helpful. Then the equipment is a mix of new and old (well maintained ) that all gel well together. I will go again

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Carlysle Salter
text: I can't say enough good things about Jason's! They have great personal trainers who are supportive and will make sure you meet your goal. It doesn't matter if you want to lose a little weight or become a bodybuilder; they will see to it that they meet your individual needs. Hands down the best gym in Mobile.

resp.text: You are family to us Carlysle and always will be!

name: chad raybon
text: Hands down the best gym along the Gulf Coast, been training here since I was 13 and I couldn't imagine being anywhere else. By far the best selection of free weights and top of the line equipment you'll find anywhere. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff and Jason is one of the best people you could ever hope to meet. This is without a doubt the place to be if your serious about your health.

name: annette bucci
text: I have been working out at Jason's for over 10 years now..It is convenient and he has the best staff ever..Bob is the sweetest and most friendliest guy you will ever meet.I love working our here😊

resp.text: You are way beyond member...You are family!

name: Jeremy Day
text: Jason's is awesome!! It has a very wide range of equipment, any where from power lifter, to first time in the gym equipment. Facility is always clean, and the staff here is always friendly. The smoothies are great too. I work shift work and often don't get off until most of the other gyms are closed, so the 24/7 access is a life saver!

name: Lane Pilger
text: I can not say enough great things about Jason's!  Its more than just a gym, its a family.  Great equipment, great trainers, and great products.  I personally have been transformed.  Jason and his team are the best and I would recommend this gym to absolutely anyone, as a matter of fact, I always do.

name: Josh Justice
text: I have been a member of this club for years and have enjoyed every second of it. The trainers are exceedingly friendly and knowledgeable. It is the best fitness club in the city. The 24 hour access is unbeatable.

name: Carena Kiser
text: Love this gym the personal trainers are awesome and it's open 24 hours so I can go any time. The facilitie and equipment  are always clean. They also have a great selection of supplements, along with a smoothie bar for after my workout.

name: Warren Nicholson
text:
Best Gym in Mobile.  I've known Jason for years
and he knows his stuff.  The staff there is great
too, and they treat everyone with respect  The most
important thing is this: YOU GET RESULTS!

name: Joshua Billie
text: Love the gym its very hard to find a gym that actually never crowded Jasons Fitness provides just that along with friendly staff and HIGHLY CLEANED AREA and Equipment. Great GYM and MEMBERS so if your in Foley or Mobile area don't hesitate drop in.

resp.text: Thank you Josh!

name: Bowdoin Atchison
text: Jason's is the best health club in Mobile, AL hands down! It's never crowded so I can easily get a full workout in under an hour. I enjoy the basketball court also.

name: Zach Taylor
text: Steller looking gym. Staff was great. Isnt crowded. Just wish I could afford it.

resp.text: You always get what you pay for and right now you can get the best for only $49 a month!

name: Stephanie M Hughes
text: After many years of being away from lifting weights, I decided to return. Jason's staff is both friendly and helpful. With the help of their Personal Trainer, Craig Barbarin, who gave  me great guidance and encouragement, I am on my way to feeling much healthier. With God's Grace this "grandmom" will not stop. If you are looking for a "good gym" with all the right equipment, come to Jason's.

name: tyler frey
text: Best gym around, awesome people and staff!

resp.text: Thanks Tyler.  It's members like you that make us the club we are today!

name: Aaron Ferguson
text:
Very friendly staff, clean machines and bathroom. Nice variety of gear including sun bed.
Best of all, 24 hour access!

name: Jerry Weaver
text: Great location and with 24 hour access.  Excellent cardio equipment and best overall selection of free-weights and machines I've seen.

name: manking4
text: Best gym in Mobile.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Kevin Johnson
text: This is the best fitness gym in the Mobile area.

resp.text: Kevin, people like you make it the best gym!

name: Magdaelizetth Moffett
text: best gym ever!

name: Russ Sirbaugh
text:
Very poor service. The first time I walked into this store I was ignored by the employee literally in the entre way. I asked where a product was and without much acknowledgement, the guy said in the cellucor section..... First off where is that, and you can't even point? Second where is even a hint of service, he can't even walk me over to the section?

My next and last experience in this store I walk in and there's different guy. He's in the back singing, like training for a musical singing, again I get zero greetings or even a hint he knows I'm in the store. I even called out and this dude still had no clue, cause he's out of sight in the back.......

name: Marlene Blevins
text: Great customer service-and store assistance by Erica Bates. Always very helpful!

name: Myron Harvey
text: Very poor customer service. I walked in and the employee didn't even acknowledge me.  He was with another customer and there was no one else in the store. A simple "Ill be right with you" would have sufficed.  I just left and will do my business elsewhere.

name: Richard Suttle
text: The store in Madison Alabama is by far the worst I’ve ever visited. The store manager and district manager should be fired. Within one week I visited this store three times. First time, I went in and no one was in the store to help me. I could’ve taken what I wanted and walked out. Second time I went 2 days later there was a handwritten sign on the door saying they would return at 3:00 pm. It was 1:30 pm at the time. The 3rd time I came their store was barely stocked. All I wanted was B12 crews but struck out the third time as well. Felt like I was being punked. What a waste of time.

name: Darlene Blackwell
text: Didn't have what I needed, but lots of other helpful things

name: Carrie Stepp
text:
Very knowledgeable and helpful store assistant.  Great products and sales.
Would recommend highly!

name: a val
text: Susan was very helpful and informative.

name: Lanny Moore
text: Nice place ..

name: anna craig
text: I’ve been going to this pharmacy for three months now and would just like to say thank you to all the pharmacist and technicians that help. Everyone is always very nice and pleasant. Thank you all for your great customer service.

name: Mac Thomas
text: Better count your pills, they have shorted me before!

name: Keisha Gregory
text: Always great customer service. Keep up the awesome work.

name: Greg Cartee
text: Absolutely do not use this pharmacy. They do not answer their phones, so I hope you never need to call them with an important question. Also, some of their supervisors don't do anything about the problem either. Last, they are careless on top of not doing their job in that they didn't even enter my full name for my prescription, so that caused problems with notifications for my prescription and who knows if it will cause any problems with insurance. Luckily I caught it soon and had them fix it, so hopefully it won't cause any problems with my insurance. Regardless, I was on the phone waiting for them to pick up the phone for over 15 minutes to avoid a wasted trip to the harmacy, and no such luck.

name: Ken S
text: Very helpful.  Easy in and out. I shopped around the store while they filled my prescription.

name: J.R. Davis
text: My family and I always get friendly, courteous service from all that work in the pharmacy.

name: Carrie E
text: Was given a free sample of a topical CBD oil ointment to use for pain relief. The ointment caused a blistering chemical burn that caused the skin to peel off. I contacted the store to let them know that their ointment caused a chemical burn and I was told that it couldn't have possibly been caused by their product and that it was an allergic reaction. All I wanted was to let them know that their product caused harm so that they could test their sample before giving it out to anyone else. Instead of an apology or even saying they would check it out all I got was accusations that it couldn't possibly have been from their ointment. I should have known better because it was probably never tested or FDA approved but some homemade remedy they are just selling out of the shop. BUYER BEWARE! Don't buy from this store. Buy from only reputable sources!

resp.text: And we did tell you to quit using it because you definitely had an allergy to it. Sweet Jesus I've got to get a one-star review because you're allergic to something that we sell. It just doesn't seem right we were really nice to you even though you were allergic to something we made.

name: Katherine Meyer (Kat)
text:
Walked in for the first time today. I came in with my husband, he and the associate talked about products for a while and my husband's time in the Marines came up. I let them talk for a while and browsed around, figuring my husband was getting the help he needed.

When they broke so that we could browse, the associate asked if I was also in the military and I said no. To this he said "Oh, so you let him do all the hard work?" What am I supposed to take from this? Does he think I have it so easy? This was just such a rude and presumptuous thing to say. I was so ticked I wanted to leave right away.

UPDATED:
The owner has been very understanding about the event and I'm glad he reached out to me to try to make things right. I really do appreciate his efforts and I've updated my rating to reflect this.

EDIT TO RESPOND: It is convenient you glossed over the fact that most all of your reviews are by 1 star reviewers with no other reviews.

resp.text:
Thanks for the feedback, Marco. I think you may have gone to a different store and sadly not Simply CBD. We don't have outsourced products nor pseudo marijuana, however, if you do make your way to Simply CBD , we'd love to meet you. We encourage our clients that have a great experience to leave reviews so others may experience the success that so many have had.

Update: Google has confirmed this review was made by the IP address belonging to John Mcaruther of Fairhope Hemp. This is the 5th attempt that Fairhope Hemp has made to leave negative reviews. Google has removed the others. I asked that this one stays so others may read. We wish you the best, John

name: barb Olson
text: I was at Gulf Coast Music this past Tuesday. I wanted to purchase a ukulele but was not familiar with what to buy.  I purchased a Glarry Ukulele for $89.00 plus tax. When I got it home I decided I wanted to buy a better brand so I took it back to find the place closed before the time it said on the door. The sign said "Sorry for the Inconvenience". I brought the Ukulele back the next day and he told me I couldn't  return it because he is a wholesale dealer and the said "no returns". I did not look at the signs he had in the store or my receipt because I paid him in cash. Needless to say I left as a very unhappy customer. Now, I went on line to see what this Ukulele sells for because if he's a wholesale dealer I should have saved some money on the ukulele.  With tax, I paid $98 plus dollars and I could have paid $36.00 with free shipping on line.  This guy should not be in business and  he ripped me off. Had he taken it back or......put the cost of the ukulele toward another one there wouldn't have been a problem....So much for him saving me money because he's a wholesale dealer.   He's dishonest!  Don't give him your business.

name: Tyler Vann
text: Pure Life Pharmacy is an amazing family oriented business. The Pharmacist are very knowledgeable and are always willingly available to answer any questions we may have about our medicine. I highly recommend the  mail program; it is very fast. Re filling our medication is just as simple as a reply to a text message. Everyone should use Pure Life Pharmacy.

resp.text: Tyler, thank you for posting a great point. We are focused on the family. Our three amazing pharmacists are also all amazing mothers. They understand family and children and what it means if someone is sick in the house. Taking the time to talk to a patient about their medication may help the whole family. Thank you for also pointing out our mailing program. We specialize in mailing out medications, vitamins and supplements and over-the-counter products. Thank you for using Pure Life Pharmacy.

name: Kelly Jackson
text: Pure Life is so very helpful, always taking the time to answer my questions and provide guidance when I’m not sure what I need. It’s a personalized pharmacy and I’ve never experienced anything like it. The staff is wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you Kelly, Personalized is medicine is what we do. We get to know every patient that spends time with us. Thank you for taking the time to leave a kind review.

name: Brittany Luckie
text: This place is amazing! The pharmacists really care in helping you! They are attentive and knowledgeable and truly care. They have a very fast turn around and will go the extra mile in helping you get what you need.

resp.text: We do truly care. Thank you Brittany. Our three amazing pharmacists Alyna, Joanna and Hayley love talking to anyone who has a question and will talk for as long as that patient needs. Thank you again for leaving this wonderful review.

name: Jamie Rottger
text: This is the most AMAZING Pharmacy! The pharmacists are very knowledgeable and always take time to answer all of my questions. The staff is friendly and I NEVER have to wait!

resp.text: Jamie, thank you for taking the time to give us a rating. Our amazing pharmacists Alyna, Joanna, and Hayley love talking to patients and will spend as long as you need discussing your medication. They love what they do and are here to help. Thank you again for taking the time to rate our pharmacy.

name: Janet Baker
text: The best pharmacy ever!  So proud to have them in our area.  Pharmacists are very knowledgeable.  The entire staff are so kind and helpful

resp.text: Thank you Janet, our pharmacists love what they do and it shows. They make sure to take their time with any patient willing to listen. We are fortunate to have our 3 amazing and brilliant pharmacists. Thank you again for taking the time to leave a review and comment.

name: Rose Strotman
text: The Pharmacist's are so knowledgeable. They never act rushed. They are so help

resp.text: Thank you Rose! Our pharmacists would never rush a conversation. It seems like everything in the medical community is rushed. We do things differently. Our pharmacists slow the conversation down so nothing is missed. They very much enjoy talking with and helping patients. Thank you again for taking the time to leave a review.

name: Becky Taylor
text: I really appreciate Pure Life Pharmacy's unique approach by providing medicine and supplements at a reasonable price. They provide a valuable service to our community. Innovative and professional staff!

resp.text: And we appreciate you Becky! We are doing everything we can to lower the cost of medicine. Thank you for mentioning our supplements. If you want to know what to should take to stay healthy, there is no other practitioner as easy to get in touch with than a pharmacist. text:
We love the Services provided and the staff.

We cancelled all our insurance contracts and sell prescription medications directly at as low a cost as we can afford. We consider pricing medication a moral decision. We want to do the right thing and help lower the cost of medicine. Thank you again for taking the time to post a kind review.

name: Steve Dalby
text: Took them four (4) days to fill my prescription

resp.text: Hello Steve, Thank you for reaching out to us. 4 days is far too long if this is a regular manufactured prescription. However, you may have gotten a compounded medication from us. May I ask if this prescription was a compound? If this was a compounded medication, we should have let you know that compounds will take at least 2 working days to make. This 2 day delay is because of the time it takes to hand make a compounded medication. Also, we are not open on the weekends, so these 2 working days may be stretched to be 4 actual days before you can pick up your compounded medication. Compounding is a very labor intensive and precise task that cannot be rushed if we are going to produce a quality medication to the exact specifications of your prescribing physician. I apologize if we failed to mention this delay when you came to fill with us. I would like to make things right by offering a $50 store credit to apply to any future purchase with us. Please call the pharmacy and ask for me. I would love to speak with you about resolving this issue. ~ Jeffrey (Owner, Pure Life Pharmacy)

name: Tonya Fredriksen
text: This is one of the Best Pharmacy I have ever used!

resp.text: Thank you Tonya, that's a big statement and we love it! We will work hard to stay the best. Thank you again for great review.

Most are less expensive than other pharmacy's Pure Life Pharmacy also has vitamins and Medical Grade CBD oral and topical. We are happy to have found such a awesome group here in Foley Alabama.

name: Fred Peace II
text: My mother suffers from rheumatoid arthritis. Due to her pain gradually increasing she has been unable to completely close her hands for the last several years and dropping small objects the last several months. The Pharmacist asked us several questions and suggested a topical product they sell in the store over the counter. Shortly after applying the product mom started bending her fingers and she clenched her fist and started crying because it did not hurt. I realized the Pharmacist teared up when she saw this happen. I cannot express my gratitude and appreciation for the Pharmacist’s insight and the effort they they gave in making this new medication possible. I can only give them my sincerest thank you. Thank you for making this possible and thank you for helping us.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing that story Fred. We hope your mother had continued success with our over the counter cream. Listening to patients is the key to being able to help. It's wonderful that it all worked out. Thank you again for taking the time to write your review.

Most pharmacists or technicians will answer any questions you may have in great detail. I just did not feel good about my experience here.

resp.text: Hello Desiree, thank you for taking the time and letting us know about this issue. We apologize you had a unsatisfactory experience with us and we took your comment to heart. We had an internal meeting to discuss how this could have happened. We have some ideas of how this could have happened and we would like to talk to you directly about your experience. We have always prided ourself on our knowledge and experience, so this comment hit home. We have 3 very special pharmacists at Pure Life Pharmacy; Alyna, Joanna, and Hayley have over 45 years of combined pharmacy experience. These three are dedicated to answering patient questions correctly. If you check these messages we would love to discuss your experience off-line. Please call us. We would be happy to discuss the issue when ever you have a moment.

text: This is BY FAR the BEST wellness provider in Madison County.  Sooo much more than medicine --  They can help you with any medical issue under the sun.  Simply AMAZING staff -- they all have a heart for your best health.

name: Jessica Tollefson
text: Absolutely WONDERFUL service. I would HIGHLY recommend this compounding pharmacy to anyone and everyone in the Huntsville/Madison area who needs compounding services. I recently received a prescription from my dermatologist and it was called in to Madison Drugs to be compounded. The inside of this pharmacy is immaculate! It's extremely clean and it's nicely decorated. The pharmacist that explained my prescription to me was such a doll. I wish I could remember her name (thank you if you're reading this!). About two weeks after I picked up my prescription, I received a very nice courtesy call to ask about my experience and the service I was provided. I had nothing but positive things to say! And if that wasn't enough, I received a 'thank you' postcard in the mail with a coupon should I need a refill on my RX. In my opinion, customer service with that level of professionalism is a rarity these days. I genuinely appreciate the kindness and the extra mile that the pharmacy staff goes through to ensure exceptional service. Thanks so much!!

text: Went in at 9 to give my prescriptions only had two that didn't have many in them at all. Give them my prescriptions they was rude to me from the get go. Immediately was given attitude by pharmacist on duty so I asked for my prescriptions back and I went across the street to Walgreens that gave me no problems they didn't have to call anyone or verify anything took them 5 minutes and my script was ready. I never shop at walmart because the lines are long and they never have anyone working or willing to help especially at this location. Today was the first day I thought I'd try out the drive thru pharmacy and just overall the experience was awful would give zero stars if able to. When you go in to fill a prescription regardless of what you are getting filled you don't want to be met with unprofessionalism. Walgreens has always been my go to I love them and would recommend driving the extra mile or two just to give them your business.

name: Satoshi Nakamoto
text: Great products, very organized! The reason I'm giving you 3 stars is because your sales service seems to be misinformed and quite rude. I came in today (5/30/17) for creatine monohydrate. I left with nothing. The young girl running the store today asked why monohyrdate and when I voiced my "opinion" of this being the most researched and proven form of creatine I was scoffed at. This was baffling because I assumed her to have experience being the only one present in the store. Anyone with experience in the fitness industry knows this statement to be factual. The National Center for Biotechnology and Information as well as the International Society of Sports Nutrition have published many medical journals/articles regarding this. Okay, so maybe she was trying to sell me another product, fine I understand it's a business. It doesn't stop there though. Then she proceeds to tell me that another product creatine glycerol phosphate is superior to creatine monohydrate and all of Metabolic Nutrition's products have been evaluated by the FDA. This was quite concerning. First of all, you are misleading people. The FDA does not regulate dietary supplements. I showed her on the bottle where it clearly says "These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, prevent or diagnose any disease". I explained this by referencing the H.R.4771 - Designer Anabolic Steroid Control Act of 2014. My point behind this was the only time the FDA steps in for supplements is after they have been to the shelf in stores and caused problems. She informs me that the act did not stop Pro-Hormones from being sold and asked if I was going to run and tell on them for selling them.. REALLY?? Furthermore, she had no knowledge of how the other product was superior. She told me she believed this product to be better because of what other customers have told her. Hearsay and reading the label, assuming it to be factual is not very scientific. If you want to sell a product this is not the way to do it! Additionally, I would like to say on my last visit to Absolute the service I received from Jordan was excellent. He was quite experienced, friendly, and informed regarding the products we discussed. Overall I probably won't let this incident stop me from shopping here, but in my opinion misleading people from the truth should not go unheard and if you don't know the truth perhaps you shouldn't be speaking.

resp.text:
Hi Mitchell,

I'm very sorry to hear your experience with us today was a negative one. Would you mind sending me an email to Matt@AbsoluteNutritionOnline.com? I'd like a chance to speak with you personally if possible. - Matt

name: Rachelle Wallace
text: Not very wise.  I was just refused service because I didn't have a mask.  As a chronic asthma sufferer I can't breathe in a mask that is effective against this virus.  I used to live in Montgomery and shop here all the time.  I  came to town for boot repair and was going to shop but you lost me for good.

resp.text:
Hello Rachelle - I couldn't agree more sincerely with you that it is "not very wise" - that is your statement, for you, it you do have chronic asthma, to be out and about in this possibly infectious time without some type of facial covering.

In no way has it been verbally stated, written or implied that someone has to wear an n95 procedural or surgical mask to enter. Our sign, placed in front of the door where you actually have to read it and go around it to access the door states, and I quote exactly: "ATTENTION - IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A MASK OR FACIAL COVERING, PLEASE STAY OUTSIDE. WE WILL CURBSIDE YOUR ORDER. CALL 334-277-9925.

The sign also states: "DUE TO THE RISK OF CONTAMINATION, ALL SALES ARE FINAL - NO REFUNDS."

You were not refused service as you have incorrectly stated - you were refused entrance to the INSIDE of our business since you had no facial covering. You were given the option to our curb side service - which you refused to take advantage of. We provide a nice, socially distanced safe outside sitting area for those without masks or facial coverings to use. We actually have a large amount of customers who prefer the outdoor curbside service and delivery option.

We require this of everyone - regardless of race, color, gender, religious or political orientation. Why you consider yourself some elite exception in that you feel that you have some special entitlement, are better than all our other customers,  and can disregard our store policy, which has been in effect for many months now, I do not know - and there are no exceptions to our store entrance policy. We are a privately owned and operated local, family business - and we set the store policy here.

You are not entitled or above all our other customers who follow the store policy and are very, very happy to be able to shop in such a sanitary, healthy and very friendly 32+ year service and community oriented business

All of us wear our correct facial coverings all day long. We do take short breaks from wearing the coverings when not in the store to allow for C02 reduction and etc - but are right back on when back inside the store.

Funny, but no one here remembers anyone of your mask intolerance issue trying to come in. What ever - there is an outside curbside service area for those reading this post who may have some type of facial mask/covering issue that can benefit from this incident, and know there is an outside curbside service option for them.

We  hope you find your happy place to shop. We are extremely busy assisting our correctly attired and extremely satisfied multi-generational customers.

name: Ty Callahan
text: Although the products can sell themselves employees aren't friendly at all and even if you're spending a lot of money they will give you the wrong item and when you correct them they will try to tell you what THEY use... Like no I asked for this kind and I'm paying. NOW you wanna tell me what you use. Felt like a drug deal or something. Poor customer service maybe racist/biased, I don't know but I know I  felt my business was NOT appreciated will DEFINITELY go somewhere else going forward. Edit: And  I didnt look for manager or ask for names as from atmosphere from the particular employee i was immediately turned off.. And as someone cleverly cross-examines me as "reply" from "management" below I don't feel any different from my experience prior.

resp.text: Hello Ty...have no idea what you were looking for since you weren't working with either me, Willard or Matt...who are the upper management and who one should go to if there is some issue that didn't meet your expectations...you obviously don't frequent our store to know our 30 plus years and history offering 3 generations of persons of all races, religions, orientations and etc to even use the racial bias statement. Since you did not attempt to speak with myself, Willard or Matt...and discuss your issue...that makes it difficult to know and understand your statements...our 3 generational loyal and very appreciative customers know from long term experience that we are a caring business that serves persons of all colors, or whatever differences with equal appreciation and attention...the young cash register clerks are nothing but that and are not meant to give advise or tips on anything other than where products are and to assist you in the checkout process...questions over and above that level should be directed to the management level if seeking advise of any kind...we apoligise in advance if your experience was not what you were looking for, and wish you health and wellness, and we hope you find your happiness in shopping where you so choose...racial bias is not a practise allowed at our business. We wouldn't have been in business for 32 years in Montgomery Alabama where at least half of our customer base are persons of color and different cultural and religious persuasions...also...in closing...let me thank you for your review and any other similar post claiming an inequity or racial bias...your post has actually brought in even more business from our cutomer base calling and coming in to shop and support our loving and caring business even more...best free advertising in a while...so many thanks again...

resp.text: Thank You Shenee for your post! We try out best to help each and everyone we can! Stay safe!

name: Rosemary Perdue
text:
i have been doing business with Health Wise Foods since 2010 when i discovered the store while taking Hot Yoga classes in the basement.  Then when i got sick.... i became a frequent customer.  The owners, Management and staff have all been supportive, friendly, professional and knowledgeable throughout my journey.  They have been in business 30 years, and have never exhibited any prejudice against anyone.  I was homeless 18  months and they knew it, and helped me to get the best products for my needs to keep me functioning during that time.

Due to my chronic babesia flares,  i have been unable to wear a mask during the ongoing pandemic, and all of the staff have been very helpful getting my products and bringing  them out to my vehicle.  I love the fact that they care about their customers and have gone above and beyond during this time to make sure that those of us who are immune compromised have the natural treatments we need even if we are unable to wear a mask.

Additionally, i love their knowledge.  When i have a weird symptom that im not sure what to do about, they give me suggestions, as well as warnings on contraindications. Both in person and via Facebook.   Healthwise is where i send everyone!

resp.text: Thank You so much for your review Rosemary! You have come along way on your life's journey living with Lyme's and I am so proud to see how much you've learned and shared with so many others dealing with the many trials that come along with it. I enjoy our frequent talks and updates both in person and on FB...and we've had  quite a few over the years! Hopefully we won't have to deal with face mask issues for too much longer...I guess time and common sense will tell. Let me know how your doing with the Kroger Kit protocol. Thanks again for being such a great role model for those with Lyme!

name: Dora J Crow
text: I’ve been shopping at Healthwise for many years, since way before they expanded. I’ve seen them grow into a welcome presence in the natural homeopathic all in one stop shop they are today. They offer so much more than vitamins & minerals. Fresh organic sustainable food, and dry goods that rival any large grocery store. I’ve bought probiotics, prebiotics, vitamins, minerals, alkaline water and so much more. They offer local products too, like honey and candles. The personalized one on one service they offer is above and beyond any local store. They are kind, compassionate and helpful to anyone asking questions when faced with so many choices. Anything and everything they ever suggested for me helped me so much. Now, with the Covid-19, they are asking people to wear masks in the store or plan to call ahead and order what you need and they will bring it out to you, curbside. People complaining they cannot wear a mask have the alternative to call from their car, make an order and literally in seconds they bring it to your car. I also have health issues where I cannot breath if I wear a mask. I ordered a couple minutes before reaching their store and had my purchase soon as I pulled into the parking lot. I don’t understand people thinking the store staff try to push only the products that they use themselves. They have not done that to me in all my times in store. Well. That doesn’t include the time they suggested some tasty tea, though. All in all, there’s not another place around that offers what Healthwise Foods does. Check them out for yourself. Call or visit them today! Check out their local honey and candles!

resp.text: Thank You Dora for your great review! We appreciate you sharing your experiences while shopping with us for the many years we've had the pleasure of assisting you. I am so glad you mentioned the outside curbservice available for those who either forgot their facial covering or have some issue where they can't tolerate the mask for certain reasons. Will be glad when the new batches of honey become available soon. The candles are such a nice product to have on hand for your own enjoyment or as great gifts...made from the beeswax that the honey comes from at Sweet Bee. Very green oriented to not waste the beeswax and make a great product at the same time! Thanks again for sharing your experiences and helping with the awareness of the common sense in using a facial covering at this time!

name: Danny Randolph
text:
If you are serious about your health you need not go anywhere else. Healthwise is the store you have been searching for!

I have shopped at Healthwise for over 15 years. The owners stay on the leading edge of knowledge related to health and nutrition. They are always available to assist you with answering your questions. They have never rushed me and they take the time to answer all my questions. I trust them for their extensive knowledge of nutritional and holistic treatments and practices.

Additionally, I trust them to validate and verify that their suppliers are actually providing the product identified on the package. Many large chain stores and grocery stores sell brands that are nothing but sawdust and powder. You can be confident you are getting the product on the label. They also sell grass-fed beef and other meat products that are healthy for you -- not full of hormones and antibiotics.

The owners require their staff members to train on which herbs or supplements would be the best solution to address whatever health condition you are trying to treat. The staff is very friendly and they are right there to help you if you have a health related question, or you can't find a product you are looking for.

I realize the are other health stores in the local marketplace. I have stepped into some of them as I was driving around town. I was curious about their knowledge of health and nutrition, the suppliers they purchased from, and the prices they were charging for the different products I regularly purchase. I could not find any store who could match the knowledge of owners and staff at Healthwise. The range of products were usually not as extensive as Healthwise and the prices were comparable to Healthwise.

I trust the owners of Healthwise and the quality of the products they sell. I will continue to purchase my health related items from them!

name: J. V.
text:
The customer service at Health Hut on Schillinger is terrible.
It's always been apathetic at best but yesterday it was terrible.
I walked in yesterday and four employees looked up at me and my children, didn't smile, didn't say welcome, didn't say hello but all started to busy themselves.  I wandered around for a while and found my own tea tree oil, chia seeds and coconut oil.

Two couples came in after me and were greeted and helped.

When I went to check out I stood at the counter for quite a while before a blonde tore herself away from her doing nothing to ring up my order. She apathetically asked "did you find everything you need?"
I said "no"
She said "what do you need that we don't have?"

I said "wheat berries for sprouting so I can make some sprouted bread"

She looked at me in the eyes. Finally. With some sort of "oh she actually knows what she's talking about" face, I got my first smile in 20 minutes and she said "yeah we don't have that here."

I got my stuff and left feeling ignored, unappreciated, like I wanted to return my stuff and drive 20 minutes to Virginia's and spend my money there instead.

Their rotten attitudes do not benefit the community at all. If you only want people you deem worthy to have access to health, then you are on the side of the demon GMOs and Monsantos and whoever else.
People are uneducated about health. Imagine wanting to turn your life around and walking into a "health establishment" that ignored you and/or treated you as "less than"??
You'd walk out the door defeated and no closer to a healthful lifestyle.

Embarrassing.

Trust I will NEVER walk through those doors again unless it's to get an apology or to teach customer service skills.

name: Have Thread Will Travel
text: Long story short, after many doctor's appointments I was diagnosed with fibromyalgia and put on meds that made me gain a bunch of weight and masked the pain.  I was told that my condition would always be just a matter of managing the symptoms and that I could either treat it with opioids (no thanks) or anti depressants.  After about a year of feeling like a zombie, gaining a bunch of weight, and overall still being exhausted and in pain (just not caring due to the meds) I decided that was not a lifestyle I was willing to continue with.  I stopped by the cbd store just to chat about my options. The staff was very warm and welcoming and answered all of my questions without making me feel pushed into buying something.  Margo recommended I try CBG oil for both my pain and energy issues.  I'm now completely off all my prescription meds and am doing much better than I had been on them.  I've learned to manage my pain and energy in a much more effective way that doesn't mess with my weight or personality.  Every time I stop in they are super friendly and the store is very clean and welcoming.  I love that they are always willing to check up on me and make sure that the products I use are still working for me. If you're unsure about any of these topics I definently recommend stopping by and chatting with them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your story and giving us a review.  As we always say in the store, we are not just a place to buy CBD but a place to gain education and have support after adding this wonderful plant to your daily diet.  What a difference it has made for you!  We also appreciate you bringing in your family, thank you for trusting us to take good care of them.  We will see you guys soon!

After discussing the encounter with our vet tech earning her certification on this very subject, and showing her the product, she found that oil was so weak that one bottle was only 2 doses for our sized dog.  She recommended we go to Your CBD Store.  I found Margo very knowledgeable about her products for pets.  I came prepared with questions from the vet tech, and Margo was either able to answer them or knew where to find the answer within minutes.  In addition, Margo was very pleasant and not once did she make me feel like I was an imposition by asking questions in this new area we were exploring.  Thank you, Margo.  You set a great example of great customer service...and products.  Within about a week, our dog was acting like she did pre-arthritis.  I highly recommend Your CBD Store!

name: Ashley Bowman
text:
I have been into this store twice now and the customer service is top notch. I can’t say enough about the friendliness of Mrs Margo!!! Now if you are are on the fence about trying the CBD products, here’s my suggestion for you: DO IT!!! My husband and I have decided to try it out over the last week and a half or so, and there have been MAJOR differences!!!!

My personal testimony for the CBD products: I have synthetic cartilage, a medal plate and six screws that sit across the orbital bone in the right side of my face. You can imagine the pain it causes. My first time in to check out the store and the products, I explained to Mrs Margo about the metal and screws, she allowed me to sample a pain cream they have, for several hours that day I was COMPLETELY PAIN FREE!!! For the first time in over 3 years!!!! I bought a bottle of the Water Soluble CBD oil, and took it home to try. As I have used the product I have began to notice that the pain in my face is more manageable, my anxiety hasn’t been nearly as high. Due to other medical issues, there are certain days where pain would keep me from doing ANYTHING AT ALL. It would hurt to breathe or even roll over in bed. Since using this product, I have notice the pain is more manageable, and on days that I would normally just lay in bed and try to lay completely still, I am getting up and doing things like baking cupcakes and making icing from scratch!!! I am a true believer in this product now!!! Give it and Mrs Margo at Your CBD Store in Enterprise a shot! See what it can do for you!!!

resp.text: Hi Ashley. Thank you for taking your time to share your experience with others! We are so grateful to each customer who places their trust in us at Your CBD Store. We are so humbled when a customer is able to gain back their quality of life and then share that with others. Thank you again Ashley for becoming part of our story!

text:
We have been using CBD cream (500 mg.)  for over 6 mo.  When ordering our bottle we tried the 1000 mg. to see if it would do better than the 500 mg. to help with my husband's hip, back and leg pain, so maybe he would get a better night's sleep.  His normal length of sleep is about 2 hours without having to get up to change positions, put more cream on or take more pain meds.  This is the third night of using the 1000 mg. cream and he has slept from 11 p.m. to 5 a.m. without any disturbance.  He is a polio survivor and has post polio syndrome, which causes many muscle problems.  This is our miracle drug while we are here on this earth!  God has promised us a pain free home someday, (heaven) but until then we praise Him for our new found help.

Thanks,
Karen Rickerd

Larry Koval, O.D.

name: J M
text: I like how now their smoothies are more healthy and more variety. I like you can choose what kind of sugar you want and also choose if you want added sugar strawberries or natural strawberries as example. Some fruit you can choose if you prefer wild ones with no sugar added. What i don't like is their app. It doesn't always function when you went delivery but recent with all the fees for delivery, it's no reason to order. The fees alone are so high it's like you ordering the same thing again. I order a smoothie that's 11$ but the fees also equal that much, so to me it's like I'm missing out on a smoothie so it's pointless to use until they figure out a better approach.

resp.text: J, thanks for the amazing review about our healthier smoothies! We also appreciate the feedback on our app as your feedback helps us improve on this in the future. We will share this with our team.

name: Heather Ormsby
text: Super helpful and friendly staff!

name: Jessica Lewis (Jess)
text: A very large menu with all assortments and addons! They are featuring a tart cherry flavor add-in right now. I wanted to try Banana Boat because it sounded absolutely divine but alas, they were out of the frozen yogurt used to make it so I settled for a Caribbean Way, which consists of strawberries and bananas blended with a nonfat yogurt. It was actually really good. They offer 3 sizes for their smoothies. Lots of Smoothie King merch for sale, as well as various "health" chips and snacks. I would have given 5 stars except for their being out of stock of  a main ingredient for items on their menu. The young man that was the cashier was very knowledgeable and helpful, polite.

resp.text: We appreciate the 4-star review and your feedback about our Caribbean Way smoothie, Jessica! We look forward to serving you again and making it 5 stars. 🥤

name: Heather Ormsby
text: Best smoothies but a little pricey unless you go on Fridays.

resp.text: Heather, we’re glad you enjoyed your smoothie! Thank you for the 4 stars and we hope to make it 5 stars next time.

name: Hasnain Meghani
text: Love the smoothies.

name: caroline ezzell
text: It was 8:50. They close at 9!! We pulled up at the drive through and the person started to talk to us but before we could order it shut off. We went to the window and they ran to the kitchen to ignore us. We are very angry. We were trying to build muscle after our workout.

resp.text: Sorry we weren’t there to serve you, Caroline. We are looking into this and apologize for any inconvenience. Thanks for sharing.

name: Dana Childress
text: Staff always has great customer service, great friendly and fast service, and I love there smoothies and now I can stop and get one on my way to and from work in the early mornings and afternoons.

resp.text: Dana we love to hear that! Nothing makes us happier to know we’re part of your healthy routine! 🥤❤️🥰

name: Richard Fernandez
text: Did you change your hours, we were there after 10am this morning(Sunday) and no one was there?

resp.text: Richard, sorry we weren’t there to serve you. We are looking into your feedback and apologize for any inconvenience. If you want to share more details, please email us at guestfeedback@smoothieking.com

name: A Redfield96
text: Smoothies are great! But customer service is terrible. The male working the drive through made us repeat our order several times, forgot to give half of it to us and we waited in the drive through at the window for over 15 minutes. Ridiculous. Not even an apology when we finally got our last drink either.

text: I had to actually ask for my card back after ten minutes because she forgot. Smoothie was ok, but it was chunky.

name: Gary
text: Love the smoothies here opens early drive thru is easy and service is fast. Friendly staff and I like the protein powder they have inside I take it home and use it in my smoothies.

name: Kristi Edwards
text: The service is good and they are helpful but don’t try to pay for your order with anything more than a 20 dollar bill. Even if your getting multiple smoothies they would rather throw the product away or send your on a goose chase to find change than to give you $20 in change out of a $50.. Absolutly obsurd!! Someone needs to use their brain ..

text: Mmmmmmmm : ) healthy and delicious. As well as friendly customer service.

I asked why and she said “they make them in ordered received.”.....uh, dumb answer for someone who paid and and ordered and then waited and heard you taking all the orders on your headset after mine. I got mine last. After three cars ordered and got theirs. Just choose the other smoothie king, the new one sucks.

text: The employees at this location are great! This store is always busy but they do their best to restock things all the time. My only complaint would be that customers are ALWAYS parked all down the firelane and it can be difficult to get in and out of the store.

name: Shunta Jeffery
text: Tasheka at Walmart Pharmacy (Lorna Road) is FANTASTIC!!!!!! Her customer service skills are superb and I hope we get to meet in person! She's a keeper! I told you I was gonna post about you lady!!!!!!

name: Lindsey Kennedy
text: The Pharmacy here has some of the most friendliest staff! They are very helpful, personable, and not to mention, pretty vast as far as Wal-Mart RX is concerned.

name: Christine Colvett
text: Staff I have had pleasure of working with were very nice and helpful. Sadly there are always long lines if you go inside. Sometimes my routine rx is one back order even though it's something I get monthly for years now so it kinda should be in the system you'd think for inventory purposes to keep stock accurate. Also Walmart does nothing to keep people from parking in the RX curbside pickup spots to do their shopping so often you can't actually pickup up your RX curbside because the spots are taken by shoppers to lazy to park in a normal spot.At least the pharmacy staff is nice.

name: lisa brady
text: Everyone that works in the Prattville Pharmacy goes above and beyond the call of duty. And not just with me, but others. I have seen how customers can be loud and sometimes unkind but yet the staff always maintains their integrity and professionalism. They all have a great deal of patience and never hesitate to explain things, even more than once, if needed. Thank you, Prattville Walmart  Pharmacy!!

name: Kim Dassel
text: So kind and make you feel like family.

name: Michelle Griffin
text: THE BEST!! Always professional, courteous, and willing and able to answer any questions I may have. Only pharmacy for me! Plus...I ONCE WORKED THERE.

name: Stacey Chrysostom
text: They are exceptionally kind, patient and helpful despite the volume of customers they care for. Staff is solid gold! Thank you for everything.

text: Didn’t have the prescription pain meds in stock for my father in law after his knee replacement surgery.  Had to drive 20 minutes away to another Walmart to get it filled. I called a week later to see if they had the medicine in stock for his refill and they “won’t discuss that over the phone“. They want me to drive over there and waste my time and gas to see if they have the medicine back in stock. Ridiculous!

name: Kathy Durbin
text: Long waiting lines. Rude on the telephone. Will complain of being busy with customers in front of them and being short staffed. Disregarding that the customer on the phone, is just as important. Seems, I always have some sort of issue with my refills.
