resp.text: Kristen, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review! We are thrilled that you loved your experience; our team members will definitely be happy to read what you wrote. See you again soon!

name: HunterJace E
text: This establishment is very clean and well kept. When I made my visit Zabree and her sister Caidence were working. They were extremely friendly with great customer service skills. They are exactly who the face of this smoothie king should be. The smoothies are excellent! Thank you for the great service!

name: Brandon Jasinski
text: I come to this location often, and I always order the same thing. This time however my smoothie tasted like watered down powder. I called the store and tried to explain that I always get the same thing and this one wasn’t right to which the girl replied “I made it myself that’s how it’s supposed to taste but I’ll remake it”. Look if you’re telling me it’s how it’s supposed to taste, I really don’t want you to make me another one. I hate that I had to throw it down the drain because they are on the expensive side. At least we are getting a soul bowl here soon.

name: Charlie Hunnam
text: Sad that employees can’t even follow the rules and cover their face, won’t be returning here👎👎

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing this with us, Charlie. The safety of our team members and guests is our top priority, and we will address this concern ASAP. If you want to share further details, please contact us here referencing your review: guestfeedback@smoothieking.com

name: Whitney Young
text: Delicious, quick and friendly staff. Always consistent with smoothies and always nice and clean.

name: James Lick
text: Friday's are best with 5 buck smoothies otherwise you pretty much need another stimulus check!

name: Pandalovebutton
text: Clean inside nice staff. Got my order out really quick.

name: carolyn gill
text: This is a 10/10 recommendation from me. I knew this would be a busy place but I never expected the amount of kindness I received from the employees. Not even to mention that their smoothies are to die for. such great quality and taste. Great for a hot day

name: Jena Hand
text: I’ve been with this store since day one. Me and my coworkers love working here. The owner, Starr is so passionate about this business and she treats our customers and her staff like family. I’m so happy to be a part of such a great team and serving such a great city some awesome smoothies!

name: Ashlyn Carver
text: Such an amazing staff. The quality of everything is A1 (which means it's top notch, if some of you didn't know). Smoothie King is an all time favorite and I'm happy to have one in my town!

name: Eva West
text: I normal don’t write reviews but since I moved down here from California and they just opened a smoothie king.. I decided I needed to share a great experience. On my way to work I was stuck in traffic and decided I wanted something cold and healthy. I stop  by smoothie king and ordered the Mango Fest.. 10/10 would recommend this to everyone,  it was SO good.. but besides how good my smoothie was, the staff was super friendly and super fast as well. They were pretty busy that day but everyone still had smiles on their faces and greeted everyone who walked through the door. This smoothie king is a wonderful place, and this is the only place I’ll go for my smoothies!!

name: Harleigh Hughes
text: Manager has an attitude problem and none of them know how to work their own rewards system

name: Pam Gaertner
text:
I give them a 10 out of 10 great location and friendly staff.
Staff was so patient with me and explained to me about the different kind of smoothies etc.
Im so happy they are here.
I actually met the owner and she is supper sweet.

name: Tonya Foster
text: Great!

resp.text: Tonya, thanks for the 5 ⭐! We appreciate the stellar review about our healthier smoothies 🍎🍍🍉

name: Brooke Tommaselli
text: I was so excited to find out that a location was opening near me! Best smoothie around and the friendliest staff! Only place I'll go for my smoothie needs!

name: Ashley James
text: The staff was super friendly and engaged in conversations with all customers while it was busy. It made time go by so fast and I was excited to know that Foley finally has a place with friendly staff who also works hard and effectively to produces orders. Yayyyy!!!

name: Whitney Day
text: Super friendly staff and my smoothie was so tasty! They were incredibly busy but the staff was sure to keep me updated letting me know they were working on my smoothie and they even greeted me with eye contact when I walked in!

name: William joseph Gohn
text: Very rude

resp.text: William, thank you so much for bringing this to our attention. We seek to provide a positive guest experience at our store, and we apologize for missing the mark on your visit. We will address this with our team in order to find a way to improve for your next visit. If you want to share more details, please email us here: guestfeedback@smoothieking.com

text: Sooo slow!  It’s just a smoothie

text: First time coming here, smoothie was amazing was recommended a banana surf from an employee as that is his favorite, and I'm glad I went with it. Will go back again soon for more. Would rate more stars if it was possible

name: Casey Serr
text: Super friendly staff! The establishment seems new so they are just learning the ropes :) great smoothly and fast service!

name: Pokémon bro :
text: I went in there today and was very impressed!! Great customer service, there were a lot of people in there when I went in, but they handled it gracefully and timely. Thank you for bringing smoothie king to foley! 😋

Steer clear!
Standing in the lobby for 20 minutes. 4 orders after me in line got their smoothies before I did. And their response is;
"I forgot you had an order"
Nothing but a bunch of pompous spoiled brats work this place.

text: Finally a Smoothie King in the area 🙌🏼👌🏼 Great location, the staff is awesome and the service is fast!

name: Brad McCoy
text: Stood there while 5-8 smoothies were served to customers before me. Keep in mind I placed my order before they did.. plus I only ordered 1 smoothie. Nobody even bothered to follow up with me even though they kept making eye contact with me? As if im standing there staring at them for 20 minutes because its good for my health?? Where's the customer service? Where im from i frequent smoothie king 3-5 times a week and I was excited that a location was built down the road from where I'm now living. After that experience I guess I'll just have to buy a blender and make my own smoothies cause I'm not about to waste my time like that ever again. Oh, of course all the kids working there were more worried about gossip than making my smoothie from what I noticed. Lots of ppl back there talking but not about work.

name: Stacy English
text: We are out of towners and we was super happy to come across Smoothie King They were polite and and did a great job being newly opened. Cant wait for our next trip there!

text: Gotta figure out the drive thru. Couldn't move for over 20 mins when getting food at Jimmy Johns

text: Best place in town!!

name: Ariel Torbert
text: This place is awesome !!

name: Alex Roberts
text: Great smoothies

name: Daniel Lainez Laguia
text: Honestly, best Crossfit box I have ever been. I was doing a road trip and stopped by today and worked out there. Amazing atmosphere. Charlie is a great coach and he also gave me a t-shirt and a hat from the box. I strongly recommend everyone to workout there. Thank you Charlie!

name: Brandon Carmichael
text: Been going for about 5 months now and I couldn't have chosen a better box to join. They literally take you in with open arms. Charlie and the staff are the most caring people! They always get the job done.

name: Alicia Lanier
text: This is more than just a gym.. It's where people get together to push themselves farther than they know.. Supportive people who help you achieve your goals what ever it maybe.. Not only do you get in shape, but you get an extended family.. Who will get on the floor next to you an cheer you on till your finished.. I love this place!

name: Matthew Coleman
text: This was my first experience with a CrossFit gym, and I was very impressed with CrossFit Spanish Fort! The coaches are very engaged and eager to help you push yourself forward in a high intensity without. The people are great, everyone is nice and supportive. It's a great place to work out for men and women of all ages!

name: Piper Waddell
text: I had no experience with cross fit coming into this gym. All of the coaches are very personable and patient. They truly care about you and want you to excel in the workouts and your personal strength. This is not only a gym, it's a community. Often they gather just to hang out and do life together. It's a great environment for all ages. When you join this gym you join a family that pushes you to your limits. Crossfit Spanish Fort is an amazing gym.

name: Rochelle Yantz
text: I joined this gym as soon as I moved into the area and right away could tell that this was a great community to be a part of.  The coaches and owner's are amazing and are very accommodating/understanding to your personal fitness goals/needs.  Everyone is very kind and encouraging.  The schedule is also the best I have ever experienced, they have classes throughout the day and have a big window of time for open gym.  Would recommend this gym to anyone!

name: Walter Holloway
text: Good people, thorough workouts

name: Hunter Graham
text: I am blown away by the commitment our coaches have to creating an atmosphere full of encouragement, health, and community for anyone and everyone! If it was just another gym, it'd be miserable. But, it's not. The community and encouragement is what drives me to finish each workout and a reason to take time out of my week to come. I believe it's enough for everyone to give it a shot, I promise you won't regret it!

name: Jacey-Blaire Mitchell
text: Come prepared to fall in love with this place and the people! The facilities are great, the coaches are amazing, and you'll have 30+ new work out buddies to support you. This gym is about getting you to be YOUR best, not someone else's best.

name: Cole Stringer
text: The best CrossFit box on the Eastern Shore. Wide range of class times, friendly and knowledgeable coaching staff, and a great facility!

name: Daniel Williams
text: Pathetic people and gym.   Ymca is so much better.  The fort price jumps and will steal your money.    I had email sent to me from this gym about my year contract renewal so I replied to the email that I would not be renewing.     Little did I know they will automatically keep taking your money even after you cancel.    Pathetic to customers

resp.text:
Hey Daniel. You left your review on the wrong gyms google page. This is CrossFit Spanish Fort. We are not affiliated with The Fort/TFX CrossFit. If you will please remove this & redirect to their Google page.

Thanks,
Charlie Bender

name: Mallory Rambo
text: One of the best!  Great equipment, friendly folks, awesome coaches!   What I look forward to during the week...going to this place and getting a great workout!!!

name: Alex Jones
text: Smart staff that leads fun, creative, healthy, & challenging workouts! Great community that provides accountability and a judgment free gym!!! I strongly recommend!

name: Clara Blacksher
text: My husband and I joined recently and we have been so pleased with all of the great coaching and the people we have come to know! Great place!

name: Trent
text: CFSF has an amazing community with phenomenal coaches! Charlie designs these workouts extremely well and you'll be sore every time you work out if you're pushing yourself hard enough. Don't be afraid that crossfit will be too intense for you because there's plenty of stretching and practicing of the movements you'll be performing before you actually do them! If you're looking to change yourself physically and mentally you need to give this place a shot!

name: Derek butters
text:
Today was my first time back in a long time... I have missed this place!! What better way to come back only to start with FRAN as the WOD !!!
I have to brag about this place for sec.. if your looking  for a life style change come check out CrossFit Spanish Fort,, the atmosphere is great the members all motivate one another and challenge each other to be the best they can be!! Charlie Bender has really created something special there that you have to experience.... Don't worry about failure when you go bc that's the only way to test your limits and to improve!!!

name: David W.
text: My kids do cross fit here Great staff.

name: Crystal Yarbrough
text: Extremely thankful for CFSF!! Charlie, Elana, Allison, & Will are fabulous! They have made us feel welcome and instantly made us part of the family!

name: Tiffany Anderson
text: Great facility, awesome coaches and great programming for whatever your goals may be. Highly recommend this box!

name: George Ferral
text: Great coaches and members. Very welcoming environment.

name: S. Johanna Johnston
text: Crossfit at Spanish fort has been amazing experience! The coaches are very helpful and encouraging, if anyone who has been in crossfit or is looking to start crossfit this place is perfect! Everyone at the gym is encouraging and is there to push you to the best of your abilities!

name: Harrison Horton
text: I have been doing Crossfit for over 5 years with 3 of those years being a coach. I have been to Crossfit gyms all around the world and I rank Crossfit Spanish Fort as being up there with the best. Great people, high quality coaching with attention to detail, and a clean/well equipped facility. I highly recommend this gym for anyone looking to try Crossfit for the first time or anyone who falls into the classification of a Crossfit veteran.

name: Rich R
text: Good coach, Good vibe. Highly recommended.

name: Allison Smith
text: Powerhouse community!!! The willingness and support from everyone is awesome, and truly my home away from home!!!

name: Scot Dorger
text: Good equipment, Large Facility, Great Coaches, Great Community

name: William Dudley
text: Very welcoming

name: John Sipperley
text: Great people!

name: Muamer Karamovic
text: love this place

text:
The young man (I forget his name. White guy, early 20s, slim build) was polite, helpful, and engaging.

That was my first ever visit to that store. I enjoyed it.

name: Donald Smith
text: The staff very knowledgeable about their products

name: Johnni Smith
text: Very rude lady working there, will never go back

name: Tracy West s
text: A girl named Skylar helped me and took the time to help me find what I was looking for. She even found the item I needed on clearance. I couldn't believe that I was getting what I needed for such a good price! I wish other stores that I shop had such good employees! I work at a high-end grocery store and I know customer service when I see it!

name: Sharla Adams
text: I like to buy GNC products and they have good discounts  monthly, you should check them out.

name: taylor ellis
text: Helpful staff, very informative and friendly. Andrea is normally there when I go and she is great.

name: Aundre Lacy
text: Awesome customer service!!

name: Lanea Head
text: GNC is great there is a store not far from my house they have all the kinds of vitamins women men or children made they also have supplements for working out or losing weight if you're interested in getting healthy or maybe starting the gym and living a healthier lifestyle is your New Year's resolution this year you definitely need need to check out GNC

name: Night Wolf
text: Very good customer service very helpful

name: Kristen DeJohn
text: They are really turning this place around!! Sean is always very helpful and very knowledgeable. You can ask questions without judgement and he understands that some people do not have a lot of money. He gives you options and tells you the truth about the products. He's always cleaning in there and organizing. It's easy to find things.

name: Robin Allen
text: Very friendly people working there and they were very helpful. Store very clean.

name: Tuesday Boyer
text: Absolutely great place to go to get vitamins, pre workout, post workout, all natural, weight loss or body building essentials! Manager talks really fast but he's great and knows everything!!! Great prices!

name: Justin McClew
text: Always great products. Mainly their brand

name: Al Miller
text: Good place to get your health needs.

name: dufflebag easy
text: I've been telling everybody about their ginseng line for the last 23 years..
